author: fuankg
msg: Revert r982499 and change macro in apr_version.h instead.
MingW32 windres issued a couple of warnings, and Watcom wrc broke with this
macro. This version tested with MingW32, Watcom, OpenWatcom, MSVC6, MSVC7,
and all can create now a *.res warning-free.

author: stefan2
msg: Simplify serialization of structures that may be a root structure as well
as being embedded into others. So, no longer require the initialization
routine to be provided with a root structure.
(svn_temp_serializer__init): don't try to store the root struct if none was given
(store_current_end_pointer): don't try to update the parent reference, if there is none

author: ngn
msg: Web client support for bidirectional chat (VYSPER-230, by Bogdan Pistol)
